Name: VR Prison Escape
About the game: This is a VR immersive simulation game that simulates prison escape. As a prisoner, the player is locked in a separate cell and needs to use operating tools to unlock the lock. In the process, there will be other obstacles, knock them down, and try to unlock the last door and escape this prison. Left controller: Press Grip button for select; the menu button for the menu Right controller: Touchpad for movement; Grip button for unlocking door with tools When picking the lock, press the grip button of the left controller to rotate the lock picking tool, and then touch the Touchpad of the left controller to rotate the lock cylinder. Try to find the best unlocking point, otherwise the picking tool will break. If you can't find the keys, the picture below is a clue for you.
